org.apache.karaf.diagnostic.core.providers

Class EnvironmentDumpProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.karaf.diagnostic.core.common.TextDumpProvider
      • org.apache.karaf.diagnostic.core.providers.EnvironmentDumpProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DumpProvider

    public class EnvironmentDumpProvider
extends TextDumpProvider
    Provider which dumps runtime environment information to file named environment.txt.
Shall be called with TextDumpProvider.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      EnvironmentDumpProvider(BundleContext context)
      Create new dump entry which contains information about the runtime environment.
